name: Deltarune in between (Fan game)
description:
Deltarune Fan game visual novel:
The story takes place in the morning, right after the ending of the second chapter of Deltarune. The love story revolves around three characters: Noelle, Susie and... Kris (You).

Status: prototype.

10/05/2022

Made by: Дмитрий Володин.

Published by: Merlin's Games.
